name: Vintage Retro 50s Fabric Baby Girl Shift Dress 12-18 m
description:
A beautiful cotton mix girl's shift dress / pinafore made from 1950's vintage floral fabric in beautiful blues and pinks. 
Fully lined. 3 vintage mother of pearl shell buttons to rear. Hand-made with love by milliemoo:too.

Limited edition of only 1. Age 12-18 months.

Keep me looking lovely ... handwash or machine wash at 40 degrees. So not bleach. Warm iron. If decorated, iron on reverse. Do not dry clean, Do not tumble dry. Dry inside out to prevent fading where possible.

Not sure what size you need, see our size guide ... 
12 months - to fit chest 19 3/4 inches / 50 cm. Height 31 1/2 inches 80 cm

All dresses are generously sized and will happily fit children beyond the 18 months stated

...........................................................................

POSTAGE TO - UK: £2.75 REST OF THE WORLD: £5.80

name: Vintage Fabric Cushion Cover
description:
Vintage Fabric Kids Cartoon 80s Patchwork Cushion Cover 
by milliemoo:too

One of a kind bright and cheerful patchwork cushion cover, made from various cotton and poly-cotton patches of 70s and 80s fabric. With a plain white linen back and zip at base.

Dimensions are as follows: 15 inches (38cm) 

Check out other funky items from milliemoo:too, including bags, purses, baby dresses and other handmade items.

name: Vintage Cartoon Fabric Bag Shopper
description:
Vintage Fabric Kids Cartoon 80s Patchwork Bag Tote Shopper 
by milliemoo:too

One of a kind hardwearing bright and cheerful patchwork shopper, shoulder bags, made from various cotton and poly-cotton patches of 70s and 80s fabric. Webbing handle. Fully lined with complimentary fabric. Small interior zipped pocket for mobile, purse etc. 

The bags contain consists of various patches from the following fabrics: Power Rangers, Batman, Bananas in Pyjamas, Captain Pugwash, Super Mario, Star Wars, Budgie, Rupert, Winnie the Pooh, Bambi, Paddington, Thunderbirds, Rainbow Brite, Fraggle Rock, Sonic the Hedgehog, to name but a few and no two are the same.

Dimensions are as follows: 
Width: 15 inches (38cm) 
Height: 15.5 inches (39)cm) 
Handle Length: 26 inches (66cm)

Check out our other funky items from milliemoo:too, including cushion covers, purses, baby dresses and other handmade items.

I am also available for commissions. Please message me in the first instance and I will be more than happy to help.

Please choose bag from the image Left to Right - Design #1, 2, 3 or 4

POSTAGE TO - UK: £3.85 EUROPE & REST OF WORLD: £6.80
